Alexandru Popescu wrote:

> The next interesting thing is what about the tests that pass even with a 
> failed setUp?
> Are they wrong? (SKIPPED is better imo ;-) ).

Yes, they are wrong, but for a different reason -- they're in the wrong 
test fixture class. :)
